name: LOST DUCKS
description:
The game is about   a mother duck losing her ducks  and is up to you to find her missing  duck.

I Hope you guys like my first game on itch.io 

background and music are from  https://opengameart.org

also are from free unity pack.

enemy and duck are made from Panda Senpai 

i like to give a thanks to the people the make this game possible 

Panda Senpai as a side programmer and pixel artist 

Charlene as our logo and game game cover designer
